pageContext.claim: “We liberated more than 3 million civilians from that brutal reign. I've also taken action to confront the corrupt and terror-supporting dictatorship in Iran.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a messy statement. The Trump administration accelerated and finished executing the Obama administration’s strategy to free 3 million civilians in Syria and Iraq from ISIS rule. But “liberating” suggests true freedom, which is misleading. Many civilians in this region are dealing with the volatility of the Assad regime, instability in Iraq, or the Turkish incursion — not exactly liberated.
